constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 112 (Monday, June 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TURNER:
H.R. 4211.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8, clause 1 provides the Congress with
the power to provide for the general welfare of the United
States.
Article I, section 8, clause 18 provides the Congress with
the power to make all laws necessary and proper for the
execution of its powers, including laws to provide for the
general welfare of the United States.
[Page H3240]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: EMPOWER NIH Act of 2021
